Tietokilta organizes a group departure to the Helsinki Philharmonic Orchestra's season finale performance of
Mahler's 8th Symphony, affectionately known as the Symphony of a Thousand
! Tickets for the symphony have long been sold out, but the Guild managed to secure ten tickets for its members!
The Symphony of a Thousand requires greater resources than any other piece of classical music, with

! Eight soloists, six choirs and a symphony orchestra gather in the large concert hall at Musiikkitalo in their most magnificent form, not forgetting the organ. The orchestra will be joined by young musicians from the LEAD! project.
Group departure at 18:15 from A Bloc, tickets will be distributed via email in advance.

title.fi: Participate in Robot Uprising: Micro Invaders 2024 ‚Äì Team Registration Now Open!

children.text: We are excited to invite you to participate in the Robot Uprising: Micro Invaders 2024 competition!

In Micro Invaders, your task is to develop an AI (or bot) that autonomously controls two 3D printed robots on the game field. The objective is for these robots to interact with their environment and execute game strategies without human intervention. It‚Äôs a great way to put your coding and robotic skills to the test in a fun physical challenge.

Your team will have three months time over the summer to build your solutions at a relaxed pace. Our organizing team will support you through regular checkpoints, providing guidance to help you refine your robots and AI systems. This schedule is designed to accommodate learning and experimentation, making it ideal for those looking to enhance their capabilities in robotics, AI, computer vision, and more. Get started and join our community at
Who: Teams of 2 to 5 people, everyone registers individually.
. It may be possible to join afterwards depending on team count so far.
for more information and fill the

We encourage anyone interested in technology and robotics to register. This is a perfect opportunity to challenge yourself, learn valuable skills, and collaborate with peers in a supportive environment. For a look at past competitions and what to expect, check out a replay of the 2020 finals on YouTube (
We hope to see your team at the competition!

title.fi: Sustainability Research + Innovation Congress 2024 / Sustainability Science Days
title.en: Sustainability Research + Innovation Congress 2024 / Sustainability Science Days

children.text: Sustainability Research + Innovation Congress 2024 / Sustainability Science Days (SRI/SSD)

j√§rjestet√§√§n kes√§kuussa 2024 p√§√§kaupunkiseudulla. Torstaina 13.6. ohjelmassa on Operaatio Arktiksen ja kumppaneiden j√§rjest√§m√§ kolmen keskustelun tapahtumasarja eri n√§k√∂kulmista ilmastointerventioihin. Tapahtuma on englanniksi.

Lis√§tietoa osallistumisesta ja kongressin lipuista l√∂yd√§t SRI:n nettisivuilta. Liput ovat reippaasti edullisemmat etenkin HY:n ja AY:n opiskelijoille, eli kannattaa hy√∂dynt√§√§ mahdollisuus osallistua t√§h√§n ainutlaatuiseen kongressiin (HY/AY-opiskelijat 10$ / muut opiskelijat 120$ / normaalisti 400$).
WELCOME TO THE HEART OF THE CLIMATE REPAIR DEBATE!
The world‚Äôs biggest sustainability science event
Sustainability Research + Innovation Congress 2024 / Sustainability Science Days (SRI/SSD)

is coming to Helsinki & Espoo in June 2024. On Thursday 13 June, Operaatio Arktis and partners will host a series of three events on different perspectives on climate interventions. The events will be in English.
We welcome all those interested to participate!

For more information on how to attend and get tickets for the Congress, please visit the SRI website. Tickets are considerably cheaper for HY and AY students especially, so it‚Äôs a good opportunity to attend this unique international congress (HY/AY students 10$ / other students 120$ / normal 400$ for on-site tickets).

title.en: Host an exchange student for a month

children.text: Oletko suuntaamassa kes√§t√∂ihin pois pk-seudulta ja k√§mpp√§si on j√§√§m√§ss√§ tyhjilleen?
Jos vastasit kyll√§ johonkin kysymykseen niin ryhdy majoittajaksi Helsinkiin vaihtoharjoitteluun tulevalle FiMSIC-l√§√§kisvaihtarille

Vaihtarit saapuvat suorittamaan kuukauden vaihtoharjoittelua suomalaisessa sairaalassa. Majoittajana tarjoat vaihtarille majoituksen h√§nen kuukauden vaihtoharjoittelun ajaksi. Diili tarjoaa majoittajalle maksettavan majoitusmaksun verran korvausta (sek√§ lis√§ksi parhaimmillaan vaihtarik√§mppiksest√§ uuden yst√§v√§n).
Lue lis√§√§ linkin kautta ja t√§yt√§ tietosi kyselyyn! Huomaa, ett√§ ilmottautuminen ei sido viel√§ mukaan toimintaan.
Are you interested in sharing your apartment with a flatmate for one summer month?
Or are you heading away from Helsinki Metropolitan area this summer leaving your apartment empty and would be interested to host an exhange student in your flat for a month?
Consider being a host for a FiMSIC exchange student! <3

Exchange students are foreign medical students who come to Finland for a month to complete a hospital internship. The host provides accommodation for the exchange student for the exchange month and earns 200‚Ç¨ as compensation for accommodation.

Fill in your information using the provided link to a form! Note that filling out the form does not commit you to anything; FiMSIC will contact you based on it and the accommodation specifics will be agreed before making a rental contraction.

Kiinnostaako kansainv√§lisen ty√∂kokemuksen kerrytt√§minen ja englannin ja/tai ranskan kielitaidon petraaminen? Kanadan ja Suomen v√§lill√§ on astunut voimaan uusi sopimus, joka mahdollistaa 18-35-vuotiaille nuorille helpon matkustamisen ja ty√∂skentelyn toistensa maissa. Suomen kansalaiset voivat nyt hakea kolmeen ohjelmaan: Working Holiday, International co-op (harjoittelu) ja Young Professionals.

Interested in gaining international work experience and improve your language skills in English and/or French? A new agreement has recently came into force between Canada and Finland that enables easy travel and work for youth between 18 and 35. Finnish citizens can now apply to the three programmes: Working Holiday, International co-op and Young Professionals.

Video guide for filling out the application:

title.fi: Osallistu kyselyyn ja k√§ytt√§j√§testaukseen opiskelumotivaatioon ja pelillist√§miseen liittyen
title.en: Participate in a survey and user testing related to study motivation and gamification

children.text: Onko sinulla joskus ollut vaikeuksia opiskelumotivaation kanssa tai etsitk√∂ keinoja hallita ja seurata opintojasi? Osallistumalla t√§h√§n tutkimukseen autat kehitt√§m√§√§n mobiilisovellusta, jonka tarkoituksena on lis√§t√§ opiskelumotivaatiota erityisesti itsen√§iseen opiskeluun. Pyyd√§n osallistumaan riippumatta taustoistasi tai opintojesi tilanteesta. Riitt√§√§, ett√§ opiskelet korkeakoulussa.

Tutkimus toteutetaan osana pro gradu -tutkielmaani Oulun yliopiston tietojenk√§sittelytieteiden maisteriohjelmassa ja siihen voi osallistua kokonaan et√§n√§. Osallistuminen on t√§ysin vapaaehtoista ja sen saa keskeytt√§√§ miss√§ vaiheensa tahansa ilman, ett√§ tarvitsee kertoa syyt√§. Kaikki vastaukset k√§sitell√§√§n luottamuksellisesti ja nimett√∂m√§sti siten, ett√§ ket√§√§n ei voi tunnistaa vastausten perusteella. Aineistoa k√§ytet√§√§n vain pro gradu -tutkielmassa ja tieteellisiss√§ julkaisuissa.

Kysely on t√§ysin englanniksi, mutta voit vastata my√∂s suomeksi. Siihen sis√§ltyy pelillistetyn ja suostuttelevan sovelluksen varhaisen version testaus ja v√§itt√§mi√§, joihin vastaat asteikolla 1-5 (1 = t√§ysin eri mielt√§, 5 = t√§ysin samaa mielt√§). Lis√§ksi vastaat taustakysymyksiin ja halutessasi yhteen vapaaehtoiseen avoimeen kysymykseen. Kysymyksiin ei ole v√§√§ri√§ tai oikeita vastauksia, vaan on t√§rke√§√§, ett√§ vastaat itse oman n√§kemyksesi mukaan. Osallistuminen onnistuu parhaiten tietokoneella, mutta on mahdollista my√∂s puhelimella. Vastaaminen vie vain noin
aikaasi, mutta tulokset ovat ratkaisevia t√§lle tutkimukselle.
Kysely√§ saa jakaa eteenp√§in muille korkeakouluopiskelijoille. Kysely sulkeutuu jo

Have you ever had trouble with study motivation or are you looking for ways to manage and keep track of your studies? By participating in this study, you help in developing a mobile application aimed at increasing study motivation, especially for independent study. I ask you to participate regardless of your background and the state of your studies. All that is needed is that you study in higher education.

This study will be conducted as a part of my master‚Äôs thesis in the Information Processing Science degree program at the University of Oulu, and you can participate entirely remotely. Participation is completely voluntary and can be withdrawn at any point without having to tell why. All responses are kept confidential and anonymous so that no one can be identified from the responses. The data is used solely for the master‚Äôs thesis and scientific publications.

The survey is completely in English. It includes testing an early version of a gamified and persuasive application, as well as statements, to which you answer on a scale of 1-5 (1 = strongly disagree, 5 = strongly agree). In addition, you will respond to background questions and one voluntary open question. There are no right or wrong answers, instead, it is important that you answer according to your own view. Participation is best done on the computer, but it is also possible on the phone. Responding only takes about
of your time, but the results are pivotal for this study.
You can fill out the survey here:
Feel free to distribute the survey to other higher education students. The survey closes
(Finnish time), so please submit it soon.
A huge thank you and have a great day!
You can find the cat video of the week
